title: The last king of old Spa: Pedro Rodríguez's unforgettable 1970 win
summary: Pedro Rodríguez delivered one of F1's most legendary drives at the old Spa in 1970, taming one of the world's fastest circuits to claim his second GP win after a relentless duel with Chris Amon

qa_pairs.question: Which driver won the 1970 Belgian Grand Prix at the old Spa circuit?
What was significant about the 1970 Belgian Grand Prix for Pedro Rodríguez?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It was his second Grand Prix win.
wrong_options: It was his first Grand Prix win.

qa_pairs.question: Which circuit is known for being one of the fastest in the world and hosted the 1970 Belgian Grand Prix?
